TopicTitle: Help! KSP enhanced edition keeps crashing

Articles.Content:
Spoiler

 

Help, I've just downloaded ksp enhanced edition on my Xbox one console and am having problems. Loading screen stutters but usually loads but has crashed twice. Once loaded I follow the on screen instructions and go on the following sequence of screens before ending on the the 4th screenshot "home screen" . I have taken shots of the screen on my phone but this will not let me attach them. If you need them you will need to either explain how to attach or provide an email for me to send to

Spoiler
